column4: is there anything like finder? i mean a file manager with finder-style?
it is the default file manager
it doest not include all functions that finder has...
lots.... just watch some video on youtube
i have used OS X since 10.2, and I'm not sure what is missing
10.5 or 10.6 just watch it, its intredible
i have used 10.5's finder, but not 10.6's, it isn't out
if you feel functionality is missing, you can submit an idea to brainstorm.ubuntu.com
it has preview of almost all kinds of files, and a quick look for any file type... very usefull... and can do searchs from the manu panel...
search is available in ubuntu & nautilus gives small previews of files. if you want similar functionality to Quick Look, submit it to Ubuntu Brainstorm
and yes quick look is very useful, however, it is not apart of the Finder, it is a different system entirely ;)
hehe im lazzy, it would be cool to have a all-in-one media player like windows media or mac os x equeavalent
yeah i know what u mean... but im just a regular user
